channel.title: Could someone make me a sig please?
channel.description:
Ok well I just became a Mod at www.rs2mm.com , and i was wondering if someone could make me a sig? If so I would like it to be
Background Color - Black Text - It should say "RS2MM" and it should say "Mod in the BlackMarket" or something related to that.
I would like it to look simulare to the one below.
[center][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v234/jpatric56/RS2MMBanner-1.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: Could someone make me a sig please?
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

i would like to edit it for you, but i dunt know the text he used, ill look into it

Read full topic
